title: Mefenamic acid
summary: Mefenamic acid is a member of the anthranilic acid derivatives (or fenamate) class of nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs), and is used to treat mild to moderate pain.[1][2] It is not widely used in the United States due to its side effects and high cost compared to other NSAIDs.[3][4]:â€Š334
